mapper.insert: INSERT INTO community_tb( tag, title, username, content, readcount ) VALUES (#{tag}, #{title}, #{username}, #{content}, #{readcount})
mapper.select: SELECT c._id, c.tag, c.title, c.username, c.time, c.readcount, c.content, u.usernickname FROM community_tb AS c JOIN user_tb AS u ON c.username = u.username WHERE c._id=#{_id}
select * from community_tb where time >= now()-86400 ORDER BY readcount DESC LIMIT 10;
